short_summary: Vehicle hoist kit and installation services for a fleet of approximately 700 vehicles.
description: The Department of National Defence has a requirement for a vehicle hoist kit and its installation services in the National Capital Region. The installation is intended for a fleet of approximately 700 vehicles.
tags: Trade agreement: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
### Notice of Request for Proposal
#### Solicitation Number: W6369-23-X038

The Department of National Defence (DND), specifically the Technical Service Support Ottawa-Gatineau (TSS O-G), is seeking proposals for the provision of a Vehicle Hoist Kit and its Installation Services in support of their fleet in the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Tender Details
* Date of Publication: May 5, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: June 7, 2023 at 14:00 (ET)
* Amendment Number: 4
* Tender Status: Expired
* Procurement Category: Goods and Services
* Procurement Method: Open Competitive Bidding
* Evaluation Criteria: Lowest Price
* Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Region of Opportunity: Canada
* Region of Delivery: World

#### Background Information
The TSS O-G requires a vehicle hoist kit and its associated installation services to support approximately 700 vehicles in the National Capital Region (NCR).

#### Eligibility and Technical Specifications
Vendors must meet the following Eligibility and Technical Specifications:
* Suppliers must have a minimum ETA (ECC Net) rating of 60% to be considered for this tender.
* Vehicles to be serviced are to be part of the NCR's fleet of approximately 700 vehicles.

#### Procurement Process
Proposals must be submitted in accordance with the solicitation document and evaluation criteria outlined in the Request for Proposal (RFP) document available on the Canada Buys website.

#### Contact Information
For any inquiries or clarifications, please contact Ethan MacGowan at:
* Email: ethan.macgowan2@forces.gc.ca
* Phone: (613) 408-8346

The tender deadline has passed. Available documents related to this tender can be retrieved from the Canada Buys website. 

---

Feel free to ask me any questions.
